segments.source_content: We are happy to announce **Docusaurus 3.7**.

translations.zh-hant: 我們很高興宣布 **Docusaurus 3.7** 正式發布。

segments.source_content: Docusaurus is now compatible with [React 19](https://react.dev/blog/2024/12/05/react-19).

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 現已相容於 [React 19](https://react.dev/blog/2024/12/05/react-19)。

segments.source_content: Upgrading should be easy. Our [release process](/community/release-process) respects [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/). Minor versions do not include any breaking changes.

translations.zh-hant: 升級過程應該相當順利。我們的[發布流程](/community/release-process)遵循[語意化版本控制](https://semver.org/)，次要版本更新不會包含任何破壞性變更。

segments.source_content: ![Docusaurus blog post social card](./img/social-card.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![Docusaurus 部落格文章社群媒體卡片](./img/social-card.png)

segments.source_content: ## Highlight

translations.zh-hant: ## 重點更新

segments.source_content: ### React 19

translations.zh-hant: ### React 19

segments.source_content: In [#10763](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10763), we added support for [React 19](https://react.dev/blog/2024/12/05/react-19), and the Docusaurus website is running on React 19 already.

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#10763](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10763) 中，我們新增了對 [React 19](https://react.dev/blog/2024/12/05/react-19) 的支援，且 Docusaurus 官方網站已運行於 React 19 之上。

segments.source_content: From now on, all newly initialized sites will run on React 19 by default, and React 19 will be the minimum required version Docusaurus v4.

translations.zh-hant: 即日起，所有新初始化的站點預設將使用 React 19，且 React 19 將成為 Docusaurus v4 的最低需求版本。

segments.source_content: However, React 18 remains supported, and existing Docusaurus sites can either choose to stay on React 18, or upgrade their dependencies to React 19:

translations.zh-hant: 不過 React 18 仍持續獲得支援，現有 Docusaurus 站點可選擇維持使用 React 18，或將依賴項升級至 React 19：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_0c911872

segments.source_content:
:::warning

There's no urge to upgrade your site immediately.

React 19 is a bit heavier than React 18. Since we support both versions, we don't leverage yet the new features that are exclusive to React 19.

However, upgrading to React 19 prepares your site for Docusaurus v4, that will drop support for React 18.

Here are good reasons to upgrade your site before Docusaurus v4:

- You have custom React code and want to ensure it is ready for React19
- You plan to leverage the brand-new React 19 features in your own code
- You use custom or third-party plugins and want to ensure their compatibility
- You have a monorepo and want to align the React dependency to v19 for all packages

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

無需立即升級您的站點。

React 19 比 React 18 稍顯臃腫。由於我們同時支援兩個版本，目前尚未利用 React 19 的獨家新功能。

但升級至 React 19 可讓您的站點為 Docusaurus v4 做好準備，該版本將停止支援 React 18。

以下是建議在 Docusaurus v4 發布前升級站點的理由：

- 您有自訂 React 程式碼並希望確保其相容於 React19
- 您計劃在自有程式碼中運用 React 19 的全新功能
- 您使用自訂或第三方插件並希望確保其相容性
- 您採用單體倉儲架構並希望統一所有套件的 React 依賴項至 v19

:::

segments.source_content: Along the way, we [fixed](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10786) all the remaining hydration errors reported by React 19, some of them produced by our aggressive HTML minifier settings.

translations.zh-hant: 在此過程中，我們[修復](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10786)了 React 19 回報的所有殘留 hydration 錯誤，其中部分錯誤是由我們激進的 HTML 最小化設定所導致。

segments.source_content: ### SVGR plugin

translations.zh-hant: ### SVGR 插件

segments.source_content: Docusaurus has built-in support for [SVGR](https://github.com/gregberge/svgr), allowing you to seamlessly import and use SVG files as React components:

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 內建支援 [SVGR](https://github.com/gregberge/svgr)，讓您能無縫導入 SVG 檔案作為 React 元件使用：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_5a41b4fb

segments.source_content: This built-in support has been the source of various bug reports due to the inability to customize the [SVGR Options](https://react-svgr.com/docs/options/), in particular the [SVG Optimizer](https://svgo.dev/) options.

translations.zh-hant: 這項內建支援過去因無法自訂 [SVGR 選項](https://react-svgr.com/docs/options/)而引發多項錯誤報告，特別是 [SVG 優化器](https://svgo.dev/)的相關設定。

segments.source_content: In [#10677](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10677), we extracted a new [`@docusaurus/plugin-svgr`](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-svgr) that you can now configure according to your needs. It is included by default in our classic preset:

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#10677](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10677) 中，我們抽離出全新的 [`@docusaurus/plugin-svgr`](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-svgr) 插件，現在您可以根據需求進行配置。該插件已預設包含在我們的經典預設集中：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_af983f82

segments.source_content: ## Other changes

translations.zh-hant: ## 其他變更

segments.source_content: Other notable changes include:

translations.zh-hant: 其他值得注意的更新包括：

segments.source_content:
- [#10768](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10768): Blog authors have built-in icons for social platforms bluesky, mastodon, threads, twitch, youtube, instagram.
- [#10729](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10729): Blog now supports `frontMatter.sidebar_label`
- [#10803](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10803): `@docusaurus/remark-plugin-npm2yarn` now supports Bun conversions.
- [#10672](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10672): Upgrade Algolia DocSearch to `algoliasearch` v5.
- [#10800](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10800): Docusaurus Faster turns Rspack incremental mode on by default.
- [#10783](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10783): Improve Dutch theme translations.
- [#10760](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10760): Improve Korean theme translations.

translations.zh-hant:
- [#10768](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10768): 部落格作者現內建支援 Bluesky、Mastodon、Threads、Twitch、YouTube、Instagram 等社交平台的圖示。
- [#10729](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10729): 部落格現支援 `frontMatter.sidebar_label` 設定。
- [#10803](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10803): `@docusaurus/remark-plugin-npm2yarn` 現支援 Bun 套件管理器的轉換。
- [#10672](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10672): 將 Algolia DocSearch 升級至 `algoliasearch` v5 版本。
- [#10800](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10800): Docusaurus Faster 現預設啟用 Rspack 增量模式。
- [#10783](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10783): 改善荷蘭語主題翻譯。
- [#10760](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10760): 改善韓語主題翻譯。

segments.source_content: Check the **[3.7.0 changelog entry](/changelog/3.7.0)** for an exhaustive list of changes.

translations.zh-hant: 完整變更清單請參閱 **[3.7.0 版本更新日誌](/changelog/3.7.0)**。
